tool_description: Official spacHero  SPAC API  with live rankings, SPAC target names, merger meetings, warrant redemption deadlines, price targets, SEC filings, investor presentations and more.
name: spacHero - SPAC Database
title: spacHero - SPAC Database

api_list.name: SPAC Top-10 Rankings
api_list.description:
Returns Top-10 gainers, losers and volume leaders for a given period and equity type (i.e., common, unit, warrants). 

Accepts three query parameters:

**period: **daily, weekly, monthly
**type:** common, unit, warrant
**sortby:** gainers, losers, volume

api_list.name: SPAC Summary
api_list.description: Retrieve SPAC summary including important dates, status and target names.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spachero-spac-database.p.rapidapi.com/summary/GGPI"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spachero-spac-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spachero-spac-database.p.rapidapi.com/summary/{symbol}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spachero-spac-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Latest SPAC Deals, IPOs, Closings
api_list.description:
Returns a list of latest SPAC events, such as deals, ipos, closings, rumors.

**Available options are: ** ipo, closings, deals, rumor

api_list.name: SPAC Calendar
api_list.description:
Get important SPAC dates such as merger meetings dates, warrant redemption deadlines, definitive agreement dates, unit split (estimate), SPAC deadline (estimate).

Available options: merger, split, deadline, redemption

api_list.name: SPAC SEC Filings
api_list.description: Get latest SPAC SEC filings, filter by SPAC symbol.

api_list.name: SPAC Price Targets
api_list.description: Get latest SPAC price targets from analysts, filter by SPAC symbol.
